species.title: **A Glimpse of the Innumerable Alien Warriors**
species.subtitle: Choose your bounty hunters, freighter bums, smugglers, space pirates, or mercenaries to enter the galaxy!
species.bottomText: **Backed by the blockchain, Cantina gives you complete ownership over your in-game characters to fight, raid, and battle your way to Riches and Glory!**

variations.title: **Fully-modelled 3D NFT characters**
variations.subtitle: Take the galaxy down in a mission-based game mode with Cantina Royale’s fully functioning 3D NFT Characters!

pve.title: The Raid Dungeon - PvE Game Modes
pve.gradiantTextLine1: Raid & loot great treasures and token
pve.gradiantTextLine2: rewards as you grapple with enemies,

pvp.title: Enter the Arena - PvP Game Modes
pvp.gradiantTextLine1: Battle it out with other online players in 1v1,

scholarships.title: NFT Lending Platform
scholarships.subtitle: **Lend or borrow a 3D playable character from NFT holders to earn a profit in Cantina Royale!**
scholarships.gradiantTextLine1: Powered by Verko’s Lending Platform, NFT
scholarships.gradiantTextLine2: owners can lease out their digital assets to

apes.title: **Our 1st Bootstrapping Collection with Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC)**
apes.subtitle: Choose your Space Ape and play now! More collaborations are coming with other renowned NFT collections.
apes.gradiantTextLine1: Our 3D Modeling technologies allow NFT Interoperability

cantina.title: Cantina - No rules, no mercy, no hierarchy!
cantina.gradiantTextLine1: **Join the rewarding sci-fi lowlife adventure for free in PvE and PVP modes!**
cantina.gradiantTextLine2: **Cantina Royale is a tactical arcade shooter play-and-earn game built on the**
cantina.gradiantTextLine3: **Verko Layer 2 utilizing the latest Metaverse Experience Framework.**
